Name: Blade Runner
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Tangy and fruity but not too sweet.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2005 at Zoulou Bar, Berlin, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Blade Runner contains 241 calories
